text: aihikajīvitattil avar celavaḻikkunnatinṟe ‎upama keāṭuntaṇuppuḷḷa oru śītakkāṟṟinṟetāṇ. at ‎svantattēāṭ atikramaṁ kāṇicca oru ‎janavibhāgattinṟe kr̥ṣiyiṭatte bādhiccu. ‎aṅṅaneyat ā kr̥ṣiye niśśēṣaṁ naśippiccu. ‎allāhu avarēāṭ drēāhameānnuṁ ceytiṭṭilla. avar ‎taṅṅaḷettanne drēāhikkukayāyirunnu. ‎
